Name: Abia
Description: Located in southeastern Nigeria, known for its commerce and industry.

Name: Adamawa
Description: A northeastern state with diverse cultures and the Mandara mountains.

Name: Akwa Ibom
Description: Known for its oil resources and beautiful coastal landscapes.

Name: Anambra
Description: A commercial hub in southeastern Nigeria with a rich Igbo heritage.

Name: Bauchi
Description: Known for its game reserves and historical sites.

Name: Bayelsa
Description: A major oil-producing state in the Niger Delta region.

Name: Benue
Description: Known as the Food Basket of the Nation for its agricultural produce.

Name: Borno
Description: A large state in northeastern Nigeria, home to Lake Chad and Kanuri culture.

Name: Cross River
Description: Known for its rich biodiversity and the famous Calabar Carnival.

Name: Delta
Description: A key oil-producing state with a diverse ethnic population.

Name: Ebonyi
Description: A southeastern state known for agriculture and salt mining.

Name: Edo
Description: Home to the historic Benin Kingdom and rich cultural heritage.

Name: Ekiti
Description: A southwestern state known for education and agriculture.

Name: Enugu
Description: A former coal-mining region with strong Igbo traditions.

Name: Gombe
Description: A northeastern state with agricultural and commercial significance.

Name: Imo
Description: A southeastern state known for commerce and industry.

Name: Jigawa
Description: A northern state with a strong agricultural base.

Name: Kaduna
Description: A major northern state with economic and educational significance.

Name: Kano
Description: The most populous state in Nigeria, known for its ancient trading routes.

Name: Lagos
Description: The economic hub of Nigeria, known for its commercial and cultural significance.

Name: Ogun
Description: An industrial state in southwestern Nigeria.

Name: Ondo
Description: A southwestern state known for cocoa farming.

Name: Oyo
Description: A historically significant Yoruba state, home to Ibadan.

Name: Rivers
Description: A key oil-producing state in the Niger Delta.

Name: Sokoto
Description: A historic state known for its Islamic heritage.

Name: Zamfara
Description: A state in northwestern Nigeria, known for agriculture.
